name: breeze-light-syntax
readme:
# breeze-light-syntax

Light syntax theme for your breeze dark ui

### With matching [breeze-dark-ui-edge](https://atom.io/themes/breeze-dark-ui-edge)
```shell
 apm install breeze-light-syntax
```

The matching [UI theme](https://atom.io/themes/breeze-dark-ui-edge),

Here is the [breeze-dark-syntax](https://atom.io/themes/breeze-dark-syntax).

but most other Syntax themes work fine as well.

**screen-01**
![breeze-dark-ui + breeze-light-syntax](https://github.com/jonayad/breeze-light-syntax/blob/master/screenshoots/screen-01.png?raw=true "breeze-light-syntax")
> Breeze-dark-ui + [breeze-light-syntax](https://atom.io/themes/breeze-light-syntax)
